data.description:
*NEW UPDATE!* All Jobs + Infinite Overtime now include subtitles and additional language support!   

In a world where robots have replaced all human jobs, step into the "Job Simulator" to learn what it was like 'to job'.    

Players can relive the glory days of work by simulating the ins and outs of being a gourmet chef, an office worker, a convenience store clerk, and more.     

Key Jobbing Features:  
● Throw a stapler at your boss!   
● Learn to 'job' in four not-so historically accurate representations of work-life before society was automated by robots!   
● Use your hands to stack, manipulate, throw, and smash physics objects in an inexplicably satisfying way!   
● Aggressively chug coffee and eat questionable food from the trash!   
● Gain valuable life experience by firing new employees, serving slushy treats, brewing English tea, and ripping apart car engines! 
● Work the never-ending night shift with Infinite Overtime mode!

changelog.change_log:
General Fixes
• Focus aware support when launching the Oculus menu

New Features
• Full support for Quest 2!
• Fixed Foveated Rendering is turned off by default on Quest 2
• Future support for 90fps on Quest 2 when fully enabled by the Oculus platform
• Quest 2 controllers shown when using a Quest 2

Visual Fixes
• Improved image filtering/quality for both Quest and Quest 2
• Fixed some depth sorting issues for Quest 2
• Corrected numerous layout issues in the Office Worker, Gourmet Chef, and Store Clerk jobs for 2 and 2.5 meter playspace sizes

Other
• Fixed various minor issues

**New Features**
Added support for Oculus Mixed Reality Capture
Enabled the Dollhouse Mode modifier cartridge

**Major Bug / Crash Fixes**
Fixed an issue with incorrect physics time step
Added logic to support pressing of the briefcase button (Oculus Menu) on the right-hand controller when “Switch Oculus and Menu Buttons” was enabled in the Oculus Quest menu
Fixed a number of memory leaks

**Other**
Fixed a few issues with briefcase language selection
Fixed multiple typos in subtitles
Fixed various minor issues

**New Features**
Subtitles have been added, with language support for English, German, Spanish, French, Korean, Japanese, and Binary.

**Performance Fixes**
Miscellaneous performance improvements

**Other**
Fixed various minor issues
